text: Asplenium virens is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, where it is found in coastal forests. This habitat is fragmented and degraded, and habitat loss is the main threat to the species.Navarrete, H. & Pitman, N. 2003. Asplenium virens. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2.
